description:
Tucker is another guy that I think looks more mature than he really is. He had only turned 18 about a couple weeks before this shoot.
LOVE his body hair and facial hair. Very sexy guy. And his nuts are HUGE. Fans of big balls and body hair should be super happy.
Tucker is a military kid, and he and his buddies checked out the site before he came in to do his solo. He's was concerned he would be on the front of the site forever, so I think he is hoping to stay under the radar on this shoot. So keep it quiet so he will come back and do more!
He's got an amazing hairy bubble butt, and I wanna see a dude (or me!) give it some attention. Not sure we will see him again, so snatch this video up!
Enjoy!
title: Tucker - Solo
